name: Meet The Animals
description:
You are a small independent farm owner floating their way through their own chunk of space and time. enjoy walking among your lands to discover small mysteries and secrets, as well as interact with the multitudes of animals that have seemingly became conscious and have some... interesting thoughts they would like to share with you.

Key Features
-Explore a beautiful hand crafted forest and farm
-Interact with many different animals
-Find Easter eggs hidden along your lands
-Take control of a farmer and experience the world through their eyes
-A beautiful sound track created by amazing artists
-Robust lighting and atmospheric features
